meanings.definition: The gelatinous mass of eggs laid by frogs.
meanings.sent1: The pond was full of frogspawn, waiting to hatch into tadpoles.
meanings.sent2: I found some frogspawn in the shallow water near the lily pads.
meanings.sent3: The children were fascinated by the slimy frogspawn floating in the pond.
meanings.sent4: The frogspawn resembled tiny jelly marbles, glistening in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: As I peered into the water, the frogspawn looked like a cluster of tiny pearls.

meanings.sent1: The female frog will frogspawn in the pond during the mating season.
meanings.sent2: After mating, the frogs will frogspawn in the shallow water.
meanings.sent3: The frogs decided to frogspawn in the garden pond, much to the surprise of the homeowners.
meanings.sent4: The pond seemed to frogspawn overnight, as if by magic.
meanings.sent5: The frogs worked tirelessly to frogspawn before the rainy season arrived.
